name: Luigi Editor V1.0.0
description:
Controls:

- Click The Buttons Or Number Keys (WIP) Top Switch Between Blocks, Items, etc.

-Arrow Keys to Move and Jump

-Space to Throw Fireballs

-0 (Zero) to Play / Edit your level.

-R to Reset Level

-E to Erase (or just click a block twice but erasing is better)

-Press C to View Your Level Code, and Click It 3 Times to Highlight the whole code. Copy and Paste it somewhere to share it with other people!

If you want to help support me and this game please subscribe to my Youtube channel: Banddy - YouTube

This game receives updates every month so feel free to give suggestions on things to add!
